name: ContextMenu.CheckboxItem

disabled.description: Whether or not the checkbox menu item is disabled. Disabled items cannot be interacted with and are skipped when navigating with the keyboard.
disabled.description_zh: Whether or not the checkbox menu item is disabled. Disabled items cannot be interacted with and are skipped when navigating with the keyboard.

checked.description: The checkbox menu item's checked state.
checked.description_zh: The checkbox menu item's checked state.

onCheckedChange.description: A callback that is fired when the checkbox menu item's checked state changes.
onCheckedChange.description_zh: A callback that is fired when the checkbox menu item's checked state changes.

asChild.description: Whether to use render delegation with this component or not.
asChild.description_zh: Whether to use render delegation with this component or not.

el.description: The underlying DOM element being rendered. You can bind to this to programatically interact with the element.
el.description_zh: The underlying DOM element being rendered. You can bind to this to programatically interact with the element.

description: A menu item that can be controlled and toggled like a checkbox.

slots.name: builder
slots.description: The builder attributes and actions to apply to the element if using the asChild prop with delegation.
slots.description_zh: The builder attributes and actions to apply to the element if using the asChild prop with delegation.
